name: Nazeem
description: Smug Whiterun social climber; mouthpiece in the Talos shrine harassment scheme. Cowardly when steel comes out.

aspects.high_concept: Cloud District Braggart and Social Parasite
aspects.trouble: Runs at the First Sign of Real Consequences

stunts: Slippery Talker: +2 to Deceive when deflecting blame onto others.
notes: Not a combatant. If attacked physically, he prioritizes escape or surrender.
